snippet: The National Hockey League's players union on Friday urged a U.S. court not to grant Commissioner Gary Bettman broad power to override arbitrators when deciding how severely to discipline players for improper on-ice conduct....
lead_paragraph: The National Hockey League's players union on Friday urged a U.S. court not to grant Commissioner Gary Bettman broad power to override arbitrators when deciding how severely to discipline players for improper on-ice conduct.

headline.main: NHL Players Union Says Bettman Can't Restore Defenseman's Ban
headline.print_headline: NHL Players Union Says Bettman Can't Restore Defenseman's Ban
